page.title: 08FAMILY LIFE
page.content: 7:30 am Saturday June 8th We got up and I had a bath.8:00 am We had croissants and coffee for breakfast. 8:30 am Family drove to Newport for my sisters ballet.9:00-9:45 Had to watch my sister.9:45 Went to MacDonalds to pick up squash for the St.Marys Church Fete.10:30 am Dropped the orange off at the church then home for early lunch.11:30 am We left for Midshires Building Society office to be dressed as a bride and groom for the float in the afternoon Carnival at Wolverhampton.The float displayed a polystyrene house and car.2:00pm the procession started.4:30pm Arrived in time for end of the Church Fete .I had one go on the inflatable castle.5:00pm Had tea ,6:30pm Went to Junior school to watch "MICK WALL" the mime artist. In aid of the stage lighting appeal fund.8:30pm home and bed.
